author: nothingface0
body:
#### PR description:

This PR provides fixes and new arguments to the existing `personalPlayback.py` script, which is an easy way to simulate how DQM works in production and playback, locally.

Add arguments for `run_key` (was hardcoded to `pp_run`), scram arch (also hardcoded to a deprecated value, now takes whatever the `$SCRAM_ARCH` env var is set to), add search path for `cmsset_default.sh` on cvmfs, fix log call, fix temporary file write mode. 


#### PR validation:

An example of the script in action:

```bash
RELEASE=CMSSW_16_0_X_2025-11-09-0000
cmsrel $RELEASE
cd $RELEASE/src
cmsenv
git cms-addpkg DQM/Integration DQMServices/StreamerIO
git cms-merge-topic nothingface0:fix_personal_playback

# Update the HLT Global Tag
sed -r "s/^GlobalTag\.globaltag[[:space:]]*=.+/GlobalTag\.globaltag = \"151X_dataRun3_HLT_v1\"/" -i DQM/Integration/python/config/FrontierCondition_GT_cfi.py
scram b -j
./DQMServices/StreamerIO/scripts/personalPlayback.py DQM/Integration/python/clients/ecalgpu_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py -p /eos/home-d/dpapagia/data/run399012 --run_key cosmic_run --clean --playback_time_lumi 10 --playback_nlumi 15
```
title: [DQM] Fixes for personalPlayback.py
